title: NEW 40 Card Low Grade T206 Lot w/ Many HOF's and SL's *PRICE DROP*
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: NEW 40 Card Low Grade T206 Lot w/ Many HOF's and SL's *PRICE DROP*
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T206 lot available for sale. Most of these are obviously very low grade.  Condition should be accurately reflected by the scans but please feel free to ask any questions. Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. 3 or more ship for free. Payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

Are the Old Mill backs spoken for yet?  If not, I am interested.  PM sent.
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!

Hurricane arrived on Monday.
Cards arrived on Wednesday.
Electric company arrived today to restore electricity.

Thanks for the cards, secure packing and prompt shipping.

Best Regards,

Eric
